sense.def: Alternative Names liu tan 留痰 , abiding phlegm; tan zhi 痰 滯 , phlegm sluggishness. Etiological Agent. of tan 痰② , phlegm, stagnating and accumulating in the body. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4: 治 腹中冷癖，水穀癊結，心下停痰，兩脅痞滿，按之鳴轉，逆害飲食 , “To cure cold aggregation-illness in the abdomen, with water and grain forming hidden-illness nodes, and stagnant phlegm below the heart. In both flanks there is an obstacle-illness and a feeling of fullness. If one presses [the phlegm], it will make sounds and change its position. It will move [upward] to harm beverages and food”.
